title: Initiate
description: The only home Riga Garrison has ever known is the Tunnel, a subterranean research facility buried deep beneath Antarcticaâ€™s ice and snow. Yet, while a safe haven for the last outpost of humanity governed by the Initiate, it is also home to a secret so dark that they will risk anything to protect it.Surrounded by deceit and faced with exile to a frozen wasteland, Riga must defy not only the Initiate's top biologists and loyalists but also her own mother, in an attempt to unearth the truth.
author: Laura L. Fox
